#### Integrative and conjugative elements (ices) annotated

These elements were annotated from the [ICEberg database](http://db-mml.sjtu.edu.cn/ICEberg/), using blastx and blastn methods.

* Files:
    * GFF: ``r ice_gff``
    * Summary table: ``r ice_summary``

Summary table overview:

```{r echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=TRUE}
df <- read.delim(params$ice_summary_file, header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
df
```
